  • A new programme of long-term savings can be launched in Russia

    byCheplev Alexei01.05.2023
    01.05.20230 views

    These are non-State pension funds. The Cabinet of Ministers of Russia has submitted a bill to the State to launch a new programme for the long-term savings of citizens, which transmits to the TAS. The document is already available in the electronic database of the Lower House of Parliament. As stated in the explanatory note to the bill, the long-term savings programme is a " simple and interesting financial product...

  • The husband of the First Vice-Mission of the universe from Omsk checked for cuts.

    byCheplev Alexei01.05.2023
    01.05.20230 views

    Turns out the size is important. The party that was represented in Omska by 51-year-old businessman Andrey Rogusov checked the Minust. The co-owner and director of the local shut-off factory in the past years tried to join the Omsky Goresuit as a self-propelled man. The attempt didn't work.
